title.value: Neighbor Auto-Grouping Graph Neural Networks for Handover Parameter Configuration in Cellular Network
title.justification: This is the title of the paper, as stated at the beginning of the document.
title.quote: Neighbor Auto-Grouping Graph Neural Networks for Handover Parameter Configuration in Cellular Network

extractions.description: The paper proposes a learning-based framework to optimize handover parameters in cellular networks, addressing the complex dependencies between neighboring cells and jointly optimizing the entire network. The framework makes use of a novel auto-grouping GCN approach and introduces local multi-objective optimization strategies. The efficacy of the framework is validated using a simulator constructed with real network data.

type.justification: The paper includes a proposal for a learning-based model validated using real network data through simulations.
type.quote: We evaluate our proposed algorithm via a simulator constructed using real network data.

name.justification: The paper's main focus lies in using Graph Neural Networks (GNNs) to model the complex dependencies in cellular networks.
name.quote: Our framework addresses this challenge in two ways. First, we introduce a novel approach to ... auto-grouping graph convolutional network (AG-GCN).

name.justification: The core application of the proposed method is to optimize handover parameters in cellular networks.
name.quote: In this work, we propose a learning-based framework for handover parameter configuration ... First, we introduce a novel approach ... auto-grouping graph convolutional network (AG-GCN).

name.justification: The paper introduces multi-objective optimization strategies for parameter configuration.
name.quote: During the parameter configuration stage, instead of solving the global optimization problem, we design a local multi-objective optimization strategy...

name.justification: The paper leverages temporal feature modeling using RNNs to capture temporal correlations in the network states.
name.quote: Second, we propose a temporal feature aggregation step with recurrent neural networks (RNN) to model the temporal correlation from the historical sequence of the network states.

name.justification: AG-GCN is a novel method introduced to capture the complex interactions in cellular networks.
name.quote: First, we introduce a novel approach ... called auto-grouping graph convolutional network (AG-GCN).

is_contributed.justification: The paper introduces AG-GCN as its main contribution to address the optimization problem.
is_contributed.quote: First, we introduce a novel approach ... called auto-grouping graph convolutional network (AG-GCN).

is_executed.justification: AG-GCN is implemented and tested in simulations using real network data.
is_executed.quote: We evaluate our proposed algorithm via a simulator constructed using real network data.

is_compared.justification: The proposed AG-GCN model is compared against baseline models like MLP and other GCN methods.
is_compared.quote: We compare the prediction accuracy of these models for throughput in Dataset-A and B ... with AG-GCN performing marginally better.

referenced_paper_title.justification: AG-GCN appears to be a novel contribution from this paper, and there is no referenced paper title provided.

name.justification: Dataset-A is a real metropolitan cellular network, one of the datasets used to validate the proposed model.
name.quote: Dataset-A: A real metropolitan cellular network containing around 1500 cells sampled hourly and collected from Oct. 17 to Oct. 31, 2019.

referenced_paper_title.justification: The dataset does not refer to any specific paper but is described as a real-world dataset.
referenced_paper_title.quote: Dataset-A: A real metropolitan cellular network containing around 1500 cells sampled hourly and collected from Oct. 17 to Oct. 31, 2019.

name.justification: Dataset-B is another real metropolitan cellular network dataset used for model evaluation.
name.quote: Dataset-B: Also a real metropolitan cellular network. The network contains 1459 cells, and the data is collected from Sep. 1 to Sep. 29, 2021.

referenced_paper_title.justification: This dataset does not reference a specific paper but is described as real-world data.
referenced_paper_title.quote: Dataset-B: Also a real metropolitan cellular network. The network contains 1459 cells, and the data is collected from Sep. 1 to Sep. 29, 2021.
